name: Doodh Jam-e-Shirin Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Doodh Jam-e-Shirin Recipe: Milk 250 grams Chia Seeds ½ cup Sugar ½ cup Ice cubes as required Jam-e-Shirin as required Almonds, Pistachio as required
instructions: Take ½ cup of Sugar add as required Jam-e-Shirin and water mix it well. Soak ½ cup of chia seedsin water. Now 2 cups of milk add as required jam-e-shirin, chia seeds and mix it well Add ice cubes and pour the mixture in the glasses and sprinkle almonds and pistachio to garnish it.
